member.name: T:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameUIProviderActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments associated with a **GameUIProvider** activation. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.summary: Event arguments associated with a **GameUIProvider** activation. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.returns: Event arguments associated with a **GameUIProvider** activation.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameUIProviderActivatedEventArgs.Kind
member.summary: The type of activation. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameUIProviderActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: The previous execution state. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameUIProviderActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: The app's splash screen. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: M:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameUIProviderActivatedEventArgs.ReportCompleted(Windows.Foundation.Collections.ValueSet)
member.summary: Signals the experience as complete, and communicates any resulting data back to the calling app. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.param: The resulting data from the **GameUIProvider** app.
